definition: reception (of transmitted signal)/to receive/to accept/to admit/to take over (e.g. a factory)/to expropriate
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

pinyin: jie1 shou1 qi4 ling2 min3 du4
wu2 xian4 dian4 jie1 shou1 ji1

sentences.english: A new type of two-branch diversity reception system is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種新的兩支路分集接收系統。

sentences.english: The Government of Japan will receive further signatures, as the Depositary of the ACTA.
sentences.chinese: 作爲協定受託國，日本國政府將負責接收進一步簽名。

sentences.english: The enhancements allow for sending and receiving short C2CK pulses.
sentences.chinese: 這些改進允許發送和接收短的C2CK脈衝。

sentences.english: Now, try to write an acceptance email of your own.
sentences.chinese: 現在，嘗試着寫一封你自己的接收函。

sentences.english: The television receiver is an electronic device .
sentences.chinese: 電視接收器是一種電子裝置。

sentences.english: Design and stimulation of the OEIC receivers.
sentences.chinese: OEIC光接收機的設計和模擬。

sentences.english: The coded signal is received by satellite dish aerials.
sentences.chinese: 編碼信號由碟形衛星天線接收。

sentences.english: Email involves attachments, and users need to print files that they receive.
sentences.chinese: 電子郵件可能包含附件，用戶需要打印接收的文件。

sentences.english: The monochromator has a large horizontal collection angle.
sentences.chinese: 這個單色器有很大的水平接收角。

sentences.english: Non-interactive items that are included in the control view cannot receive keyboard focus.
sentences.chinese: 控件視圖中包括的非交互式項不能接收鍵盤焦點。

sentences.english: Electromagnetic noises of H-field antenna dominated the receiving depth and receiving quality.
sentences.chinese: 拖曳天線的本地噪聲決定了其接收深度及接收性能。

sentences.english: Electromagnetic noises of H-field antenna dominated the receiving depth and receiving quality.
sentences.chinese: 拖曳天線的本地噪聲決定了其接收深度及接收性能。

sentences.english: Last month I talked about how to write a device driver for radio-tuner cards.
sentences.chinese: 上個月我講述了怎樣爲音頻接收卡編寫設備驅動。

sentences.english: The server part of the channel is located at the start of the server context sink chain.
sentences.chinese: 通道的伺服器部分位在伺服器內容接收鏈結的起始端。

sentences.english: How do I record packets received or transmitted?
sentences.chinese: 如何記錄接收或發送的數據包？

sentences.english: Now, receive the message from the queue.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我們嘗試從隊列接收消息。

definition: to transmit/to dispatch/to issue (an official document or credential)
to learn of (an event)/to hear about (sth)
to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
to transfer (for a specific purpose)/to allocate/(computing) to invoke (a command, an application etc)
to transfer/to maneuver (troops etc)/movement of personnel/to mobilize/to bring into play
